title: Labor Standards Complaint Forms (LS223) filed on employers in Delaware County

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Labor Standards Complaint Forms (LS223) filed on employers in Delaware County
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of all Labor Standards Complaint Forms (LS223) filed by employees of businesses located in Delaware County, NY, since 1996, including companies owned and operated by parent companies in other regions of the United States and the world with facilities in Delaware County. Additionally, I would like to request any and all records pertaining to Task Force Hotline reports of lack of safety equipment, retaliation, forced labor, or other issues filed via telephone by employees of companies located in Delaware County, NY, since 1996.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Anne Elizabeth Moore

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: HK - Touhy/FNB (July - Sept)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Records sufficient to show: Any correspondence, including emails, to and from Heather Keil with the words Touhy or 'Food Not Bombs',  from July 11, 2024 through September 1, 2024. Please include emails where Heather is cc'ed or bcc'ed.

Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit Lucy Parsons Labs for the purpose of public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c).“

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Alexandra Gelzin
